Package org.greatage.ioc.logging

This package represents all logging related classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Logger This interface represents logger that provides simplified access to all log operations.
LoggerSource This interface represents utility producing Loggers for various logging APIs by their class or name.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLogger This class represent abstract logger implementation that delegates log methods without exception parameter to those with this parameter.
AbstractLoggerSource This class represents abstract logger source implementation that delegates creation of logger by class to creation by class name.
ConsoleLogger This class represents dummy Logger implementation that logs all messages in console System.out.
ConsoleLoggerSource This class represents LoggerSource service implementation that creates ConsoleLogger instances.
Jdk14Logger This class represents logger implementation for JDK 1.4 logging API.
Jdk14LoggerSource This class represents logger source implementation for JDK 1.4 logging API.
Log4jLogger This class represents logger implementation for Log4j logging API.
Log4jLoggerSource This class represents logger source implementation for Log4j logging API.
Slf4jLogger This class represents logger implementation through Slf4j logging API.
Slf4jLoggerSource This class represents logger source implementation through Slf4j logging API.
 

Package org.greatage.ioc.logging Description

This package represents all logging related classes.
